item.description:
You're invted! RSVP only!
10/27/2012, 6:00 pm to ?
The Witches, goblins & ghouls will be waiting for you in Connecticut...
The Matthews family is preparing a costume party to celebrate Halloween (Samhain) and your presence is requested.
We want to enjoy "souling" with you on Hallowmas: Witches' New Year's Eve (The dark half of the year commencing on October 31st).
In addition to the open bar, food, haunting festivities and bonfires, there will be a monetary prize for the winners of both "Best Costume" and "Bobbing for Apples".
Join us in the "'Witchiest' state in the U.S." on Saturday, October 27th, 2012 at 428 Middlebury Road, Middlebury, CT, 06762.
Attend if you dare.....
RSVP at: http://www.facebook.com/events/362503117171616/
item.name: Halloween Costume Party
